titleInfo.title: United Jewish Appeal Prime Minister's Mission

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 7 x 6 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Denver.'' Typed on a piece of paper in the envelope: ''DRAFT; To: Rick Bugdanowitz [address]; Bob Loup [address]; Ralph Auerbach [address]; Sheldon Beren [address] [crossed out]; Larry Mizel [address]; Norm Brownstein [address]; Libby: Alan says Toltz and Beren were not there....???; Dear First name: Here are some pictures which were taken on the recent UJA Prime Minister's mission in which you participated. Harold thought you might enjoy them. It looks like you all had a grand time.; Cordially yours, Libby Printz; Director: Public Relations; Encl.''

mods.abstract: Robert Loup leads several men deplaning an Israel Airlines plane carrying bags. The men are participants of a United Jewish Appeal Denver Prime Minister's Mission to Israel.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
